title-group.article-title: Interactions Audio-Visuelles, Videodisc and Hypercard for Students of French at Ventura College, California

abstract.p: This article describes an interactive video French project at Ventura College. It describes Interactions Audio-Visuelles, the disc, the manual, and the current stacks. Furthermore, it discusses how the disc and the stacks are used in the classroom as well as the empirical outcomes of the project.
